comment.author: 69662531@N05
comment._content:
The WW1 Medal Roll states that his mother - Mrs C May - applied for his medals which would suggest that this is his baptism:

Name:Walter Gould May
Record Type:Baptism
Baptism Date:26 Apr 1896
Father's Name:Walter Arthur May
Mother's Name:Catharine Earnshaw May
Parish or Poor Law Union:Gunnersbury St James
Borough:Hounslow
Register Type:Parish Registers

The baptism also states his father was a deceased stockbroker at the time of the baptism
